name: xpintrreld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))

stmt.origin: a1i(w0, wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3)))
-| wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))
-| wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3))

body.origin: |- wss(ccom(cxp(c2, c3), cxp(c2, c3)), cxp(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cin(c1, cxp(c2, c3))))

comment: The intersection of a transitive relation with a cross product is a transitve relation. (Contributed by Richard Penner, 24-Dec-2019.)
